statements.statement: DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS ora_dwh CASCADE

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW ora_dwh.v_win_min22 (text, error_msg) AS SELECT 'CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW ORA_DWH.V_WIN_MIN22(COL1, COL2, COL3, COL4, COL5) AS SELECT DEPTNO, ENAME, JOB, SAL, MIN(ALL SAL) OVER (ORDER BY SAL, COMM DESC NULLS LAST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM TBL_EMP_BLDFUN ORDER BY DEPTNO, ENAME;'AS text,'12034 - Severity CRITICAL - Amazon Redshift SQL doesn\'t support MIN function with a number of arguments. Perform a manual conversion. ' AS error_msg

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW ora_dwh.v_date_trunc3 (col1) AS SELECT aws_oracle_ext.TRUNC(TIMESTAMP '2000-11-16 12:21:13', 'SYYYY') UNION ALL SELECT aws_oracle_ext.TRUNC(TIMESTAMP '2000-11-16 12:21:13', 'YYYY') UNION ALL SELECT aws_oracle_ext.TRUNC(TIMESTAMP '2000-11-16 12:21:13', 'YEAR') UNION ALL SELECT aws_oracle_ext.TRUNC(TIMESTAMP '2000-11-16 12:21:13', 'SYEAR') UNION ALL SELECT aws_oracle_ext.TRUNC(TIMESTAMP '2000-11-16 12:21:13', 'YYY') UNION ALL SELECT aws_oracle_ext.TRUNC(TIMESTAMP '2000-11-16 12:21:13', 'YY') UNION ALL SELECT aws_oracle_ext.TRUNC(TIMESTAMP '2000-11-16 12:21:13', 'Y')

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW ora_dwh.v_account_mult_tbl_join (acc_id, accountno, accountbalance, cur_id, cur_name, acc_st_id, acc_st_name, emp_id, emp_first_name) AS SELECT ACC.ID AS ACC_ID, ACC.ACCOUNTNO, ACC.ACCOUNTBALANCE, CUR.ID AS CUR_ID, CUR.NAME AS CUR_NAME, ACC_ST.ID AS ACC_ST_ID, ACC_ST.NAME AS ACC_ST_NAME, EMP.ID AS EMP_ID, EMP.FIRST_NAME AS EMP_FIRST_NAME FROM ORA_DWH.TBL_ACCOUNT AS ACC LEFT OUTER JOIN ORA_DWH.TBL_EMPLOYEES AS EMP ON (ACC.CUSTOMERID = EMP.ID AND EMP.SALARY > 550) RIGHT OUTER JOIN ORA_DWH.TBL_CURRENCY AS CUR ON (ACC.CURRENCYID = CUR.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN ORA_DWH.TBL_ACCOUNT_STATE AS ACC_ST ON (ACC.STATEID = ACC_ST.ID)
